#   Bing Crawler Blocklist
#   
#   This list contains IP addresses used by Bing web crawlers, the automated
#   bots operated by Microsoft to index and analyze websites for its search
#   engine.
#   
#   By using this blocklist, you can prevent Bing from crawling or indexing
#   your website content, stopping it from appearing in Bing search results
#   and related Microsoft services.
